content: a half of back sts and sleeve sts pm turn the 2nd set 3 row rs facing bring the short row into a smooth knit 5 sts more pm turn 4 row ws facing bring the short row into a smooth and purl 5 sts more pm turn pm turn the 3rd set 5 row rs facing bring the short row into a smooth knit 5 sts more pm turn 6 row ws facing bring the short row into a smooth and purl 5 sts more pm turn pm turn short row join knit a round to bring the short row into a smooth pay attention to the first stitches at the turning points and incorporate them in the round with the short row joins remove markers for short row body knit across a half of back sts until sleeve place the 52 sleeve sts on a holder co 10 sts cont knitting of chart knit across front sts until sleeve place the 52 sleeve sts on a holder co 10 sts knit back sts to end of round total 193 body sts ❀ check the numbers of stitches back 82+10 sts and front 91+10 sts cont knitting 24-rnds repeat and knit total 70 rnds the round 70 of body corresponds to round 23 of chart knit the next 9 rnds of chart for last body rnds decr 8 sts as in chart on the front rem 93 front sts 7 © 2025 olga beckmann prja freya ribbing optional change to smaller needle ❀ you have odd number of stitches 92 back + 93 front sts for the 1x1 ribbing desr 1 st in the 1st ribbing round with k2tog once time only that you have 184 sts knit rib 1x1 8 rnds then purl 2 rnds across all sts then knit 2 rnds bobble kwise ❀ note for bobble suggested to use a stretchy bobble for a traditional bobble kwise suggested to use a large needle or you knit and bobble very loosely with your project needle sleeve return the live sleeve sts to an additional needle beg in the middle of co under arm using your project needle pick up 5 sts from co sts then pick up 2 sts on the side of the arm opening knit across 52 sleeve sts pick up 2 sts on the side of the arm opening pick up 5 sts of co under arm total 10 sts under arm and 4 add sts total 66 sleeve sts knit 10 rnds change to dpns when necessary beg to knit with paired decrs work the 1st decr round k1 k2tog knit until 3 last sts skp k1 work the paired decrs in every 10th round overall 8 times decr total 16 sts rem 50 sts then knit 25 rnds more change to smaller needle when necessary knit rib 1x1 6 rnds knit 2 rnds bobble kwise loosely when necessary block wet to measurements put on your sweater enjoy your work 8 © 2025
